title: About Me
projectDescription: I'm a student and software developer from Edmonton, Canada. Below are my two most significant projects to date.

title: Flamingo
projectDescription: A beautifully designed native instant messaging app for OS X with support for Google Hangouts, Facebook, and XMPP chat.

title: Sonora
projectDescription: A minimal audio player for OS X with a strong focus on visual music browsing and a powerful centralized playback queue.
